## Checklist

- [ ] `VERSION` bumped if template behaviour changes
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` has an entry under `## [Unreleased]`
- [ ] `{{PLACEHOLDER}}` tokens remain in template source (not resolved upstream)
- [ ] `docs/` guides updated if a new user-facing feature was added
- [ ] `README.md` updated if new files were added
- [ ] Path-specific instructions (`.github/instructions/`) updated if new file patterns added
- [ ] Prompt files (`.github/prompts/`) reviewed if workflow conventions changed
- [ ] `template/copilot-setup-steps.yml` updated if runtime or build steps changed
- [ ] CI passes

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Feature / enhancement
- [ ] Documentation only
- [ ] Refactor / cleanup
- [ ] Release prep (VERSION + CHANGELOG)
